services.title: Training Programs
services.description: Interactive workshops that equip participants with practical skills to recognize and respond to digital threats, while also exploring the ethical use of AI in everyday life.

services.title: Cybersecurity Consultancy
services.description: Affordable consulting services tailored for small businesses, non-profits, and community organizations. We assess digital systems, identify vulnerabilities, and recommend cost-effective solutions to strengthen defenses against cyberattacks.

services.title: Content Creation
services.description: Digital content and technical writing that makes cybersafety and AI ethics accessible to all. Our resources include blogs, videos, infographics, and guides covering privacy, online safety, and AI awareness.

services.title: Newsletter
services.description: Your source for the latest in cybersafety, digital literacy, and AI ethics. Each issue delivers real-life cyber stories, scam analyses, privacy law updates, and practical tips to build safer digital habits.

team.name: Dr. Sarah Chen
team.bio: Former CISO with 15 years in cybersecurity. PhD in Computer Science, specializing in AI ethics.

team.name: Mike Rodriguez
team.bio: Penetration testing expert with certifications in CISSP, CEH, and OSCP. Former military cybersecurity.

team.name: Dr. Aisha Patel
team.bio: Philosophy PhD focusing on technology ethics. Published researcher in AI bias and algorithmic fairness.

team.name: James Kim
team.bio: Technical writer and cybersecurity journalist. Former editor at major tech publications.

team.name: Emma Wright
team.bio: Education specialist with focus on adult learning and cybersecurity training program development.

team.name: David Liu
team.bio: Cloud security specialist and system architect. Expert in zero-trust security implementations.
